level.text: This chapter shall apply as of May 1, 2013.
This chapter shall sunset as of September 30, 2014.

level.heading: Emergency legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 days) addition of this section, see § 5080 of the Fiscal Year 2014 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2013 (D.C. Act 20-130, July 30, 2013, 60 DCR 11384, 20 DCSTAT 1827).

level.heading: Short title
level.text: Section 5071 of D.C. Law 20-61 provided that Subtitle H of Title V of the act may be cited as the “Medicaid Hospital Outpatient Supplemental Payment Act of 2013”.

level.heading: Editor’s notes
level.text: Applicability of D.C. Law 20-61: Section 11001 of D.C. Law 20-61 provided that, except as otherwise provided, the act shall apply as of October 1, 2013.
